pages.text: $(li)Wheat can be obtained from Wheat Seeds.$(br)$(li)Cows can be feed with Wheat.$(br)$(li)You can put Wheat in a Composter to generate Bone Meal.

$(li)Farmers will exchange your Wheat by Emeralds.$(br)$(li)You can use Wheat to craft a Hay Bale, Daub, Cookies, Thatch, Grass Thatch, Scones, Hay Nest, Pancakes, Bread, Gateau, Cakes, Buns, Velvet Fortune, or Aether-Glazed Cupcake in a Crafting Table too.
